scripts.desktop:run:dev: npm run bash:format && npx kill-port 3555 && cross-env RUST_BACKTRACE=1 tauri dev
scripts.desktop:build:windows:x86: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.desktop:build:windows:x64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.desktop:build:windows:arm64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.desktop:build:macos:x86_64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.desktop:build:macos:arm64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.desktop:build:macos:universal: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.desktop:build:linux:x86_64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.desktop:build:linux:arm64: npm run bash:format && tauri build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.desktop:install:target:windows: rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && rustup target add i686-pc-windows-msvc && rustup target add aarch64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.desktop:install:target:macos: rustup target add aarch64-apple-darwin && rustup target add x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.desktop:install:target:linux: rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && rustup target add aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:ts
scripts.lint:fix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lint:prettier --fix && npm run lint:eslint --fix
